channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Tantrums, toffs, Taylor and turds – the best, worst and dirtiest of 2024’
item.description: Mirror columnist Brian Reade sees out the year with his glorious round-up of its winners and losers, and the big talents we bid a fond farewell to

item.title: Pet turkey accompanies owner to 5km Parkrun
item.description: The Maidstone-based pet owner feeds T2 meat from a scotch egg and even cheese and onion crisps in the pub.

item.title: Inside the world’s only underwater roundabout between Scotland and Iceland
item.description: The Faroe Islands have built 17 tunnels on land and four subsea - including the world’s only underwater roundabout - to deal with its unpredictable we...

item.title: 'Our Boxing Day walk was ruined after we made horrifying discovery in park'
item.description: As most families enjoyed a relaxing day in or trip to the sales on Boxing Day 2024, one couple who ventured out as part of an annual tradition were me...

item.title: Student ‘traumatised’ after managing to break her jaw with aptly-named candy
item.description: Her jaw will have to be wired shut for the next six weeks.

item.title: The human brain processes thoughts 5,000,000 times slower than the average internet connection
item.description: The brain processes signals at about 10 bits per second, millions of times slower than an average Wi-Fi connection.

item.title: Feel real good! Join Slimming World for free with this great offer
item.description: We’ve teamed up with Slimming World to offer you the chance to join your local group for FREE, saving you £5/€9.

item.title: British woman jailed in Thailand for trying to have sex on table named and pictured
item.description: A friend said she was not 'well-liked' in the UK.

item.title: Breakthrough for IBS sufferers with personalised diet tailored to their genes
item.description: A pioneering study offers new hope to patients who have this challenging condition

item.title: 'My husband's having an affair with a woman 20 years older than me'
item.description: Coleen Nolan has advice for a reader whose hubby has cheated, but after they'd been trying for a baby she's angry his affair was with someone too old ...
